text: yeonghwawa gwonseleul guhaneun jayeomodeun yeong-gwang-gwa gwonneung-i hananimkke iss nola joh-eun eonhaengdo geubunkke ileumyeo joh-eun haeng-wineun hananimkkeseo geugeos-eul nop-i eullisidoe saaghan eummoleul kku mineun ja-egeneun museoun beol-i iss-eu myeo geuleohan eummoneun supolo kkeutnano la
